title: Sen. Cory Booker | Pence's NFL stunt, Trump vs. Bob Corker and Puerto Rico: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump whips up racial tensions with transparent political stunts, while the humanitarian crisis in Puerto Rico continues. (0:49)

Then, Seth interviews Sen. Cory Booker (D-NJ) about the worst-kept secret in Washington D.C.: both sides of the aisle are very concerned about President Trump. (12:22)

Exclusively for this podcast, Late Night producer Henry Melcher asks Sen. Booker a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G. (20:43)
